text: The most underrated soundtrack in the entire OST. Only because it was overshadowed by the other God-like boss themes like Godsibb, Promised Pain etc
author: CJ is here

text: Yuji Kajiura is definitely one of the most talented composers out there. It was such a good idea by Monolit Soft to make the complete OST for this game instead of only the music for the cutscenes (as in XS2). She definitely should do more video game/JRPG soundtracks.
author: DesMondesBlut

text: And this song, of all things, wasn't on the soundtrack. In some cases not putting the song of the soundtrack made sense, when the track was quite annoying or underwhelming, but why was this removed? It's one of the best tracks in the game!
author: Neo Saturos

text: This song. This song gets me every time. The Miltian Conflict feels like a real war to me sometimes, and I am devastated by how destructive humans can be.
author: homo-no-jutsu

text: MyrtletheTurtle that even entire planets can fall because of our greed and arrogance...it truly is a tragic thing...
author: Will Coons

text: One thing I find funny, is that everyone says that some of the older call of duty games show the devastation of war, and the bad side of humanity. I beg to fraggin' differ! This conflict had me in tears the entire time. This part was a good 2-3 hours for me. Just all of the monsters released as opposed to soldiers, Feb's death and Virgil's repentance. Shion, learning she let the Gnosis out into the universe. Jr coming to the harsh reality of his situation with his brothers and the other URTVs. This part and onward was just filled to the brim with moments that I can't ever forget.
author: Sam M.

text: 2 had some bad acting. 1 and 3 were solid for the most part, considering the time period.

author: Sephiko

text: It's been almost 7 years since I played this game and it's still one of my favorite stories in a video game. Takahashi's writing is always memorable because it targets our different emotions (he wrote the scenario for all the Xeno games and he's the head of Monolith Soft). I remember after having finished this game, I kept thinking about it for days, especially knowing that the franchise had been cut short. Shion and her brother, KOS-MOS, Albedo/Rubedo/Nigredo, etc. So many memorable characters!
author: SupraDarky
